Retrieves the classes for the body element as an array.

==Usage==
%%%<?php get_body_class($class); ?>%%%

==Parameters==
{{Parameter|$class|string or array|A string or array of classes to add to the return value|optional|false}}

==Return Value==
{{Return||array|An array of class names.}}

* Since: 2.8.0
* 3.1.0 Added support for ID style classes
